topic.title: GCC Spring 2025 Animation Course Offerings
topic.text:
These are the classes offered at GCC for the spring 2025 semester. Any class marked as MAO (multiple attendance options) will be offered in the format we used this past semester: students can participate in person (recommended), online, or live online. Keep in mind that AVC 184 and AVC 200 are offered every fall and spring at GCC. All the other animation classes are usually offered once a year.  If a class is full, please contact the instructor, they can sometimes override you into the class at their own discretion. If a class is in red it is in danger of being canceled from low enrollment and if it is a class you need you should consider enrolling for spring 2025.

  • AVC185: 3D Modeling and Animation I 
    • MAO format
    • M, W 8:30 AM - 11:00 AM
  • AVC200: Animation and Interactivity
    • MAO format
    • M,W 4:00 PM - 6:30 PM
  • AVC 287: 3D Character Animation
    • MAO format
    • M, W 1:00 PM - 3:30 PM
  • AVC178: Digital Arts Studies
    • ANIMATION STUDENTS SHOULD TAKE AVC178 INSTEAD OF AVC169. They both fulfill the same degree reguirement.
    • MAO format
    • Tu, Th 4:00 PM - 6:30 PM
  • AVC184: Digital Animation I
    • MAO format
    • Tu, Th 8:30 AM - 11:00 AM
  • FMP 215: Digital Video Effects (Visual Effects for Film)
    • MAO format
    • Tu, Th 1:00  - 3:30 PM
  • AVC184: Digital Animation I
    • ONLINE ONLY
